attributes.action: investigate unmarked helicopter harassment in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I call on the Prime Minister to take seriously as he would anything else and investgiate the alleged secret harassment of UK citizens via unmarked helicopter harassment. If found guilty to force the agencies responsible to publicly apologise and say that it won't happen again.

Extensive checks are made with the Civil Aviation Authority and the Police and reports do not always coincide with police or registered helicopters

"Training exercises" has been an unsatisfactory reply from the Ministry of Defence to allegations previous.

You don't have to have seen unmarked helicopters yourself, we are simply calling for an independent investigation from the PM into a severe allegation that doesn't involve the UK Ministry of Defence or Security Services.

David Connolly

Pro Civil Liberties
Open-minded
Former Student of International Politics/Intelligence Studies.
Former UK Schools Chess Champion.
